long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your daily workflows. Unify your communications tools. With the OneCloud Chrome CRM Integrator extension, you and your team can work within the web applications you currently use without the need to switch apps to make or receive calls. The OneCloud CRM Integrator allows you to click to call, receive CRM screen pops, and more right from your web-browser. With over 30 pre-built CRM integrations, you can count on this tool to improve workflows, and streamline processes. Simply sign-in with your existing TelWare CRM login and you will be up and running in seconds.
long.ja,zh_CN,zh_TW: Telware CRM allows you to click to call, receive CRM screen pops, and more right from your web-browser. With over a dozen pre-built CRM integrations and more more being added regularly you can count on our application to improve workflows, and streamline processes. Simply sign-in with your existing Telware CRM login and you will be up and running in seconds.
